mapper.select: select t_prescription_drug.id, t_prescription_drug.prescriptionid, t_prescription_drug.sellerid, t_prescription_drug.drugid, t_prescription_drug.drugname, t_prescription_drug.standard, t_prescription_drug.category, t_prescription_drug.unit, t_sales_record.num as number, t_prescription_drug.soldnumber, t_prescription_drug.singledose, t_prescription_drug.myusage, t_prescription_drug.frequency, t_store_drug.price from t_prescription_drug LEFT JOIN t_sales_record ON t_prescription_drug.drugid = t_sales_record.drugid AND t_prescription_drug.prescriptionid = t_sales_record.prescriptionid LEFT JOIN t_store_drug ON t_prescription_drug.drugid = t_store_drug.drugid AND t_sales_record.storeid = t_store_drug.storeid WHERE t_prescription_drug.prescriptionid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t_sales_record.storeid = #{storeID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
